meanings.definition: To compile or publish a collection of literary works or excerpts.
meanings.sent1: She anthologizes poems by different authors for the school library.
meanings.sent2: The professor anthologizes classic short stories for his students to read.
meanings.sent3: The librarian anthologizes fairy tales for a storytelling event.
meanings.sent4: Her mind anthologizes memories like a book of life chapters.
meanings.sent5: The editor anthologizes historical documents to preserve the past.

meanings.definition: To select and organize pieces of writing into an anthology.
meanings.sent1: He anthologizes essays on nature for the environmental magazine.
meanings.sent2: The writer anthologizes her own poems into a book for publication.
meanings.sent3: The teacher anthologizes student essays for a creative writing showcase.
meanings.sent4: Their team anthologizes research papers into a comprehensive report.
meanings.sent5: The curator anthologizes art critiques to display different perspectives.
